attributes.additional_details:
Although like yourselves i feel very sad when people a suffering around the world i cannot help  myself thinking charity starts at home.
U.K international aid
£12.162 billion     2014 to 2015  (mail online)
U.K population 64,105,654   (wikipedia) 2014
International aid 12.162bn divided by 64,105,654 million = £189.71 per head of all persons living in the U.K.
Yet we are giving all this money away to other countries when:
 Cancer patients being refused medication.
 Patients being sent home because their are no beds or nurses.
 Elderly having to sell their homes to pay for care.
 State pensioners dying from cold and lack of support in there homes.
 Parents queueing at food banks to feed their children.
 Police force reduced.
I could go on and on but this government  thinks it is better to give British taxpayers   money away to countries rather than look after there own.
I cannot exceed 1000 Characters on this e-petition
If you agree please sign this petition.
